attributes.action: We want the Government to address the public's concerns about our society.
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum and my own survey have identified these needs.
Services have been cut and communities have suffered because of government policy, not immigration from EU, or elsewhere, or membership of the EU. All of these needs require wealth creation to provide them. The economy has been in freefall since the referendum. New trade deals  cannot be made until 2 years from triggering Article 50 have expired. We therefore believe that the best option is to remain in EU and work with our allies.
attributes.background: Brexit has shown that Leave or Remain,we have many shared ideals.A properly funded NHS. Affordable homes.Jobs.Good education without debt.Our young protected.Justice for all.The disadvantaged and elderly assisted.Enough public servants to ensure society runs smoothly and safely.UK security.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions which call for clear, specific action from the Government or Parliament. If there is a particular policy about which you are concerned, you could start a petition about that.
